main.name: Ejaz Ahmed
main.description: I love to write clean code, develop tools to enhance team productivity, and architect code for complex systems. I have over 2 years of experience in game development, and about 2 years of experience as a full stack developer for web/mobile apps
main.bio: I'm a masters student in Entertainment Arts and Engineering at the University of Utah. I did my bachelors in Computer Science from Indian Institute of Technology(IIT). I started my career as a web developer, then full stack, and finally found my dream role as a game developer. I like to do occasional treks, travel with friends, play games, and watch anime/tv series.

favouriteGames.name: Horizon Zero Dawn
favouriteGames.reason: Horizon Zero Dawn is the game that pulled me into seeking game development as a profession. Its excellent and unique combat system made me realize that this is all written by programmers and something that I can do. I like horizon for its exceptionally immersive storyline.

favouriteGames.name: Don't Starve Together
favouriteGames.reason: DST is a multiplayer survival game. I've never survived for an year in my umpteen different attempts, but its been fun everytime. There are so many strategies to explore. I end up researching a ton of stuff after every playthrough

favouriteGames.name: Portal 2
favouriteGames.reason: Portal 2 has amazing puzzles that revolve around essentially just one mechanic, open portals. It is an excellent example of environmental design.

education.degree: Master of Entertainment Arts and Engineering

work.company: The Therapeutic Games and Apps Lab
work.title: Gradudate Research Assistant

game_projects.title: Digital Othello
game_projects.description: This is a digital version of the board game othello. Players surround the opponent coins to capture them. The player with highest captured positions wins the game. Command pattern is used to implement the UNDO and REDO. State management for each turn is done using a simple enum state machine

game_projects.title: Numbers Munchers
game_projects.description: This was developed as a part of game jam

game_projects.title: Fia Maze
game_projects.description: This is a procedural maze generation algorithm. It used a new hex coordinate system using the axial coordinates
